content: this is a crochet pattern for a super cute crochet mini cactus keychain the pattern is in us crochet terms you can find a free version as a guest post on the a crafty concept blog https //www acraftyconcept com/cactus-keychain/ but if you would prefer to purchase an ad-free printer friendly professionally designed pdf version including extra photos you can buy it here on ravelry i used a small amount of bernat softee baby you will also need some stuffing a keychain fastening if you wish to use one and a needle and scissors for sewing in the ends my completed cactus is approx 4inches tall gauge is not critical for this design but you may use more or less yarn depending on your gauge this keychain is a mini tribute to the crafty cactus pillow by ashley stallsworth which you can find here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crafty-cactus-pillow-2020 i hope you enjoy the pattern and if you share your finished items on instagram i d love to see them - you can tag me clairesmadeit
